verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God’s got an army marching thru the land. Deliverance is their song, With healing in their hand. Everlasting joy and gladness in their heart. And in this army I’ve got a part.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh, the weapons of our warfare are not carnal But they are mighty, yes, they are mighty Oh the weapons of our warfare are not carnal But they are mighty in the spirit.{/lang-eng}
